3 Makanan yang Ampuh Percepatan Kesembuhan Luka Pasca Operasi
04 Nov 2019, 22:35 by Sarah Ervina Dara Siyahailatua, Mitra Tarigan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Proses pembedahan atau operasi adalah hal yang menakutkan bagi sebagian orang. Operasi bisa menimbulkan efek negatif bagi tubuh. Misalnya, seseorang yang baru dioperasi tidak bisa langsung melakukan aktivitasnya. Terlebih dengan luka jahitan setelah pembedahan dilakukan, mereka pun wajib istirahat total.
Tentu akan merugikan bagi para pekerja khususnya kepala rumah tangga yang harus membiayai kehidupan anak dan istri. Terdapat beberapa makanan yang bisa menjadi jawaban agar kesembuhan pasca operasi segera dialami dan Anda dapat kembali melakukan aktivitas seperti sedia kala.
Pertama, Pakar Gizi Universitas Indonesia Saptawati Bardosono menyarankan untuk mengkonsumsi putih telur. Ia menjelaskan bahwa putih telur tinggi akan protein albumin. “Satu butirnya mengandung 10 gram protein. Ini sangat bagus untuk mempersingkat proses penyembuhan luka,” katanya dalam acara FFI MilkVersation di Jakarta pada 4 November 2019.
Kedua, konsumsi ikan gabus juga sangat baik untuk dilakukan. Menurut Saptawati, dalam 100 gram ikan gabus mengandung energi sebesar 80 Kilokalori dan protein sebanyak 16,2 gram. Ikan gabus juga memiliki kandungan asam amino tinggi dan mikronutrien seperti zinc dan iron. “Selain mempercepat kesembuhan, ini juga membantu meningkatkan kadar darah dalam tubuh. Sehingga mengembalikan lagi darah yang terbuang pasca operasi ke angka normal,” jelasnya.
Ketiga, susu dan yoghurt juga bisa menjadi alternatif untuk dikonsumsi. Saptawati menjelaskan bahwa keduanya kaya akan protein dan enzim sehingga dapat mencegah penggumpalan darah pasca operasi. “Teksturnya yang mudah ditelan juga menjadi alternatif bagi mereka yang malas mengunyah makanan setelah tindakan,” ungkapnya.

3 Effective Foods to Accelerate Postoperative Wound Healing
04 Nov 2019, 22:35 by Sarah Ervina Dara Siyahailatua, Mitra Tarigan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The process of surgery or surgery is a scary thing for some people. Surgery can have a negative effect on the body. For example, someone who has just been operated on cannot immediately carry out his activities. Especially with stitches after the surgery is done, they are also obliged to have a total rest.
Certainly it will be detrimental for workers, especially the head of the household, who have to pay for the lives of their children and wives. There are some foods that can be the answer so that post-operative healing is immediately experienced and you can return to doing activities as before.
First, University of Indonesia Nutrition Expert Saptawati Bardosono recommends consuming egg white. He explained that egg white is high in albumin protein. "One item contains 10 grams of protein. This is very good to shorten the wound healing process, "he said at the FFI MilkVersation event in Jakarta on November 4, 2019.
Secondly, cork fish consumption is also very good to do. According to Saptawati, in 100 grams of cork fish contains 80 kilocalories of energy and 16.2 grams of protein. Cork fish also has a high amino acid content and micronutrients such as zinc and iron. "In addition to accelerating healing, it also helps increase blood levels in the body. So that it returns more wasted blood after surgery to normal numbers, "he explained.
Third, milk and yogurt can also be alternatives for consumption. Saptawati explained that both are rich in protein and enzymes so as to prevent blood clots after surgery. "Its easy to swallow texture is also an alternative for those who are lazy to chew food after an action," he said.
